text: Power of Paanch is an Indian Hindi-language fantasy television series. Produced by Ekta Kapoor and Shobha Kapoor under Balaji Telefilms, it stars Riva Arora, Jaiveer Juneja, Aditya Arora, Bianca Arora, Yash Sehgal, Barkha Bisht and Urvashi Dholakia. The series premiered on 17 January 2025 on Disney+ Hotstar. == Cast == * Riva Arora as Bela Luthra * Jaiveer Juneja as Ranveer * Aditya Arora as Ali Mazhar * Bianca Arora as Bhaggu * Yash Sehgal as Kai * Barkha Bisht as Tabu/Tanu * Urvashi Dholakia as Asma == Production == The series was announced on Disney+ Hotstar. The trailer of the series was released on 13 January 2025. == Reception == Archika Khurana of The Times of India rated the series 3/5 stars. Risha Ganguly of Times Now gave the show 3 stars. == References == == Other websites == * * Power of Paanch on Disney+ Hotstar Category:2025 television series debuts Category:2020s Indian television series
title: Power of Paanch
